#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Go to Burning Man
#Text=Burning Man has become one of the largest ( and most popular ) festivals in the world , despite the fact that many do n't consider it a festival .
#Text=Top hippy scientists have been trying to define what this event is for years , but have n't been able to come up with something concise .
#Text=The truth it seems is that Burning Man is something different for every different attendee .
#Text=Care to try your hand at figuring out what it is for yourself ?
#Text=Simply read on .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Get committed .

#Text=The present demand for this event far outstrips the available supply by more than double , according to some unattributed accounts , resulting in this prediction for the future : Burning Man tickets are going to get more expensive and harder to come by .
#Text=As a result , you must be ready to fight tooth and nail in order to attend .
#Text=You 're going to also want to get to know the Burning Man culture .
#Text=Learn the ten principles before you commit .
#Text=Find out how to buy a ticket ( or two ) .
#Text=Tickets tend to go on sale in February every year , and usually require advanced registration to be able to purchase them .
#Text=As an added fun-bonus , the actual details of the ticketing process changes from year to year .
#Text=Learning as much as you can about this year 's process will be an investment of time well spent .
#Text=Save up !
#Text=Now that you know how to buy tickets , and how much of what currency you 'll need , it 's time to start stock-piling that currency so that you can actually afford to buy a ticket .
#Text=So do whatever it is you do for money and stick as much of it as possible into a giant sack with a dollar sign on it that you will keep under your bed for the next four months .
#Text=Buy your tickets .
#Text=This may be much easier said than done .
#Text=Okay , here 's how to do it .

#Text=Prior to sale day make sure you have the following : A burners . me profile , an account on the ticketing website being used that year ( not absolutely mandatory ... . but why risk it ? ) , a confirmation of registration for the sale you 're planning on taking part in , an extremely reliable internet connection , and some kind of plastic that will magically transfer money to Burning Man LLC .
#Text=Log onto the ticketing system as soon as possible the day of the sale , which usually starts at high noon .
#Text=So at 11:50 , you should be sitting cozy , already logged in and waiting in the digital line .
#Text=Unless you did n't really want a ticket , then feel free to log in whenever .
#Text=Note to the wise , general tickets have been selling out in about an hour recently .
#Text=That 's 20,000 tickets in an hour .
#Text=Impressive , eh ?
#Text=Plan how to get there .
#Text=Okay , you did the hard part .
#Text=Your path to Black Rock City will , quite obviously , depend on where you live .
#Text=You may need to take a plane or something .
#Text=Recently , BM has implemented a policy of vehicle passes in order to mitigate vehicles on the playa .
#Text=If you 're planning on driving in , or bringing an RV ( lame ) , make sure you get your grubby little hands on a vehicle pass prior to the event .
#Text=If you are not planning on driving , investigate flights and such .
#Text=There are a few bus services that provide transportation to and from the playa during the course of the event , so it might be prudent to check those out .
#Text=Pack !
#Text=Burning Man is a high adventure camping experience in a delightful place that really wants to kill you , so pack wisely !
#Text=This is not meant to be an all inclusive list , but generally it 's a good idea to bring camping gear , provisions , wacky costumes , and of course an open mind .
#Text=For a full list check out the millions of blogs about the topic .
#Text=Here 's a tip : bring lights .
#Text=A LOT OF LIGHTS .

#Text=The playa is very dark at night , and if you 're out running around like an idiot with no lights on you 're going to get pancaked in a hilarious fashion by any number of pieces of moving art that roam the desert at night .
#Text=When lighting yourself up , try to think , christmas tree , Vegas strip , the sun .
#Text=Find a camp to travel with .
#Text=This can be a bunch of friends , or one of the dreaded turnkey camps .
#Text=Going with friends will make your journey easier and more fun .
#Text=It might also be helpful and fun to attend a regional event closer to your locale before the big one .
#Text=These are held all over the world now , and can even be a good substitute for the real thing .
#Text=Midburn , the middle-eastern burn , just made big headlines too , so you know regionals are growing in popularity !
#Text=Get out there !
#Text=Okay , the day is here , it 's time to go .
#Text=Well go already !
#Text=Just remember to obey all local laws and ordinances , The BLM , Sheriff 's office , etc. loves burning man , because it is a huge source of income every year .
#Text=Feel free to contribute to the local law enforcement offices by doing something stupid either on the way out there , at the event , or on the way back .
#Text=Do n't you worry !
#Text=There 's plenty of cops out there , so if you 're doing something wrong they 'll find you !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Burners are really mean .
#Text=Burning Man places a paramount value on free expression .
#Text=Sometimes this expression comes out as insults .
#Text=So if you ca n't take being called names , you may want to stay home .
#Text=Many things at Burning Man will try to kill you , so have fun with that .
#Text=Safety not guaranteed !
#Text=Black Rock City has one of the nation 's best law enforcement to civilian ratios .
